alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Covington; Jasper; Jefferson Davis; Jones; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued April 05 at 7:36AM CDT until April 05 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Southeastern Smith County in central Mississippi... Clarke County in east central Mississippi... Jasper County in east central Mississippi... Southeastern Jefferson Davis County in south central Mississippi... Covington County in southeastern Mississippi... Jones County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 1030 AM CDT. * At 736 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Laurel, Ellisville, Collins, Quitman, Stringer, Bay Springs, Taylorsville, Stonewall, Mount Olive, Sandersville, Heidelberg, Moss, Vernon, Turnerville, Tuckers Crossing, Hebron, Paulding, Stafford Springs, Mill Creek and Barnett. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Clarke; Covington; Jasper; Jefferson Davis; Jones; Smith
